tags.name: Admin

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: Endpoints for generating and refreshing Firebase ID tokens

post.description: Validates admin credentials and returns Firebase tokens on success.
Uses a refresh token to issue a new Firebase ID token.

requestBody.description: Request payload containing the refresh token

post.description: Exchanges a custom Firebase token for ID and refresh tokens.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: User identifier used to generate Firebase custom token

200.description: ID token and refresh token returned

post.description: Generates a UUID API key and persists it with active status.

500.description: Failed to create and save API key

get.summary: Get API key by key value

delete.summary: Delete API key by key value

name.description: Owner or label for this key
